description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Assayer's Manual. An abridged treatise on the docimastic examination of ores, and furnace and other artificial products ... Translated from the German by W. T. Brannt ... Second American edition, edited with extensive additions by F. L. Garrison, etc" Author: KERL, Bruno. Contributor: BRANNT, William Theodore. Contributor: GARRISON, Frank Lynwood. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7106.bb.32." Page: 49 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1889 Publisher: Baird & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001953757 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
